name: Respawn (tpAtAll)
description:
Built this small prototype as part of my first game jam, the Mini Jam 110: Sacrifice.

In this game you help a little ghosty robot venture across multiple levels by changing your spawn point in the game. It does not matter if you die, the little ghost is quite sturdy!

How to play Controls

You can move by using the WASD keys.

You can resume enemies by one step with the left Shift key or by pressing the next-button (they also move if you move).

You can restart the level if you are stuck with the R key or by pressing the restart button on the screen.

Mechanics

You  will always respawn at the red flag. The position of the red flag can be changed through using an in-game big red button.  Later you will also be able to pickup and place a checkpoint yourself!

Furthermore you can collect keys that can unlock locks, and enemies will push you around.

Good luck!

Credits

Music from Komiku - Level 4: First infiltration in Unresponsible Tech

SFX from pixabay

Font: Bulky Pixels

Thanks to my friend JustSis for playtesting!

Thanks to the Mini Jam team for hosting the game jam! Made all the pixelart myself and although it isn't perfect, its pretty good for a first project. Learned a lot!
